_header: I will no more go to the plow
Subjects: women, as speakers/narrators; death, longing for
_description: A woman’s complaint and wish for death — 5 quatrains (abab)

TCD490.First Lines:
I wyll no more go to the ploweI wyl go learne some other
                    thynge…
TCD490.Last Lines:
…for nowe I se I may be spardeI will go laye me doune &
                    dye
TCD490.Editions:
Scattergood,  V. John. 
             “Two Unrecorded Poems from Trinity College Dublin 490.” 
             Review of English Studies
         n.s. 38 (1987): 48-9: 48-9.
